dialogue.introduction: I have enhanced myself for air combat potential, sir. I am now a carrier, sir.
dialogue.library_intro: I am Akitsu Maru, of the Army's Hei class, sir. I was the pioneer of the modern amphibious assault vessel, able to operate new weapons such as auto-gyros, sir. We may not do so well in anti-submarine warfare. I most humbly look forward to working with you sir.
dialogue.secretary1: There are Ka-type and also fixed-wing aircraft, sir.
dialogue.secretary2: I have got caught up in this fleets atmosphere lately... I shall reflect on this, sir.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, you're touching my flight deck and... I would prefer it if you didn't touch the Ka-types, sir.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, I am aware that being on standby is part of my duties, but... after I've been assigned to this fleet I started to... feel a bit lonely, sir...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, there are no ship daughters that you will never get a chance to meet. I can say this, for it is in this way that I, too, have managed to meet you…
dialogue.wedding: I thought that you had no concerns about me. The strength of this feeling is connected… as expected of Admiral, oh, beg your pardon… I would like to know more and more about you, sir.
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, the liaison officer has arrived.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Akitsu Maru, Daihatsu and Ka-types are ready to go.
dialogue.equipment1: Sir, I desire on full inspection of the Ka-types, sir.
dialogue.equipment2: The people in the factory are hard workers, sir.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I am getting quite familiar with this dock, sir.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Forgive me. I request to be repaired again, sir.
dialogue.docking_complete: A shipgirl has came out from the bath, sir.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new friend has arrived. Aaah...such inspiring words, sir.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The observation auto-gyros report the fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Or rather, we'll make it fly, sir!
dialogue.battle_start: It's time for me, Akitsu Maru to unleash her evolved capability, sir!
dialogue.attack: Now, fellow Ka-type Autogyros, move out!
dialogue.night_battle: Hmhmhm, I have good night vision.
dialogue.night_attack: I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
dialogue.mvp: My flight deck has been useful, sir. I am quite pleased for it, sir.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I can't show myself to the officers or the admiral in this condition, I'm too embarrased!
dialogue.sunk: I see...this is what...people call pride...I un...der...stand...now...
dialogue.air_battle: I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!

hourly.0100: 0100 hours. Hmm, are you unable to sleep?
hourly.0200: 0200 hours. Will you be requiring a lullaby? That was a joke.
hourly.0300: 0300 hours. Still drinking at a time like this...gah...
hourly.0400: 0400 hours. Ah..did I just catch myself dropping off!?
hourly.0500: 0500 hours. I cannot eat anymore... Eh!? Were you saying something?
hourly.0600: 0600 hours. The morning air is quite fresh.
hourly.0700: 0700 hours. You should not neglect sleep.
hourly.0800: 0800 hours. I have seen to the admirals schedule for today.
hourly.0900: 0900 hours. Plan for today. First off, expeditions.
hourly.1000: 1000 hours. A daily mission is fine too.
hourly.1100: 1100 hours. This morning's mission is coming to an end. Let us do our best.
hourly.1200: 1200 hours. Here is your lunch. It is army rations. It is good to try these things now and again.
hourly.1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, did you find your lunch palatable? Your expression is hard to read.
hourly.1400: 1400 hours. Such a large amount of resources!
hourly.1500: 1500 hours. You could build a battleship with what you used for myself, yes?
hourly.1600: 1600 hours. That was quite reckless Admiral. One such as I is specialised in amphibious operations. Now that you've spent so much I shall have to....what!?
hourly.1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, land or sea which is it to be...
hourly.1800: 1800 hours. Are you going to have dinner?
hourly.1900: 1900 hours. Dusk has fallen. Naval Base is nice at night too.
hourly.2000: 2000 hours. A submarine belonging to the land forces? I do not know. Maruyu!? Good gracious!
hourly.2100: 2100 hours. We have an early start tomorrow. We should finish off for today soon.
hourly.2200: 2200 hours. Thank you for all your hard work today admiral.
hourly.2300: 2300 hours. I feel that we shall meet someone important tomorrow.
